{T}: Move any number of +1/+1 counters from Wennex Captain onto another target creature.
Reborn 2–{4}{W}{W} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for it’s reborn cost. If you do, it enters the battlefield with two additional +1/+1 counters on it and becomes reborn. When it dies while reborn, exile it.)[/i]
